entry.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin Knots 0.21.1.knots20210629 released
entry.summary: Bitcoin Knots has released version 0.21.1.knots20210629, which is available for download from their website. The new release comes with updated translations, multiple bug fixes, and performance improvements. Users are advised to report any bugs they encounter through GitHub's issue tracker. Additionally, those who wish to receive security and update notifications should subscribe to announcements on the Bitcoin Knots website. For more information on the release notes and change log, users can visit the provided GitHub link.
